name: Hellboy
description:
I am Ꮋᴇʟʟ 亗 Ᏼᴏʏ★࿐ Whatsapp Chuddy Buddy built in NodeJs to make experience better
	 if Any Problem : www.youtube.com/c/SuhailTechInfo

OWNER_NAME.description: Bot ke owner ka name likh chutiye🤡

WELCOME.description: put 'false' or 'true' to enable & disable WELCOME

GOODBYE.description: put 'false' or 'true' to enable & disable GOODBYE

IMAGE.description: bot ke liye😾image ka url dal🥵aaram se💦

FLUSH.description: Make it 'true' if bot connected but not responed (After deployement!)

WARN_COUNT.description: Warn count for users to kick/block when warn limit exceed!

READ_COMMAND.description: Read bot cmds? isko false rkh😚

AUTO_SAVE_STATUS.description: Auto save whatsapp status? false krde isko bhi

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Put Your Heroku Api Key Here🌚💋

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Put Your Heroku App Name Here,jo sbse uper app name likha tha

WAPRESENCE.description: Fill the value: 'unavailable'(for nothing) | 'available'(for alwaysonline) | 'composing'(for show always😂typing) | 'recording' | 'paused'

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: auto view status ke liye true/false kr. lekin bkl false rkhna isko,ye dimag ka bharosa kr deta hai😾💦

MSGS_IN_LOG.description: Hmesha false rkhna apni safety ke liye. wrna lode lgne mai jyada time nhi lgta🤡🌚.

READ_MESSAGE.description: auto read msg hai ye😾lode lgne se bchna hai to false rkh ise.🤡

DISABLE_PM.description: Disable bot in DM, Take it false if you wanna run bot in your pm (if MODE is Public)

PREFIX.description: Enter your desired prefix for bot. you can set `all | . | .!*`

OWNER_NUMBER.description: The phone numbers of the users who you want to be admin for the bot (should be in international format without + and multiple numbers must be separated by a comma ",")

SESSION_ID.description: yha pe SESSION_ID dal bsdk💦😾,ab hr cheez smjhau kya bc😂.

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: put your OPENAI api key here.Get it from beta.openai.com

ELEVENLAB_API_KEY.description: Put your ElevenLab api key here for Aitts. Watch tutorial from https://youtu.be/HCDcdPtkwg4

REMOVE_BG_KEY.description: put your REMOVE BG KEY here.Get it from removeBg.com

MODE.description: Worktype of your bot. Use public or private, if it is private then only bot number can use it. If public then everyone can use it.
